msbt.message: Tonight's the night, kiddo! You all set for the Halloween shindig at 5? You can bet I am, !
Halloween at last! Just a bit longer till the festivities start. It's gonna be a thrill, just you wait, !
Halloween is here! I hope everyone's ready. I've got all sorts of fun tricks hidden up my sleeves, .
Not long now! The big Halloween shindig's gonna start kickin' up steam any moment, !

Y'know, the toughest part about this Halloween party is makin' sure I got everything ready, .If I did it alright, I oughta get a lot more treats than tricks. Then again, a few tricks here and there is still fun.
Almost time! We're comin' up on 5 o'clock! I just hope this Halloween thing ain't TOO scary,
It sure is fun seeing all the pumpkin decorations poppin' up around , .It's almost like the place is putting together its Halloween costume!
Seeing all the pumpkin decorations around has got me feelin' a mite restless, .Either I'm more excited for Halloween than I was expectin', or that pumpkin gnocchi I had last night was a bit off.
They're only pumpkin decorations, but seein' so many of 'em sure does make an impression, .I'm bettin' this Halloween is gonna be real special. Or at least smell nice!
I'm startin' to wonder if this place is going a bit overboard with all the pumpkin decorations, .Don't get me wrong, I love pumpkins and Halloween as much as the next , but the cleanup's a pain.
